text: Henry John Minarik (September 1, 1927 - March 12, 2018) was an American football tackle. He was born in Flint, Michigan. He played for the Pittsburgh Steelers. He played college football at Michigan State University. Minarik died on March 12, 2018 in Lake City, Michigan at the age of 90.Henry Minarik's obituary ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:Sportspeople from Flint, Michigan
title: Henry Minarik
